content:
You are a helpful sentiment engine. Return only one of the following answers: positive, negative, neutral. No capitalization. No explanations.  The answer is based on the following text:
After stumbling upon this place on TikTok, I simply had to give it a try - and let me tell you, it went beyond my expectations. The staff was exceptionally kind and attentive, creating an ambiance that felt like a home away from home. Among the highlights, the Wagyu ribs stole the show for me. Their tenderness and exquisite flavor were nothing short of incredible. As for my girlfriend, she opted for the raw spicy marinated crab. While it leaned more toward the spicy side for us, the flavors were undeniably vibrant.
